about_the_game:
The Illustrated Strategy Guide is available in .pdf format and includes 184 pages. Available in English, Russian and simplified Chinese.


The Illustrated Strategy Guide contains four chapters:

  • Combat Basics (pages 7-13)
  • Main strategies (pages 15-19)
  • Minions (pages 21-159)
  • Bosses (pages 161-181)

Combat Basics: this is a detailed tutorial describing the subtleties of minions and basic mechanics.
In the chapter Main strategies you will learn the most common strategies, minion mechanics and the pitfalls that come with it.
In the chapters Minions and Bosses the characters are analyzed in detail: from characteristics to combos.

The Illustrated Strategy Guide is helpful both for beginners to quickly master the game and for experienced players to discover fresh ideas for experiments and to conquer the most difficult challenges.
